languages.text: "Справедливого расследования и суда Теодора фон Валанциус уже в любом случае не получит. Вердикт может вынести только Вольный Торговец... и он{mf||а} это уже сделал{mf||а}".
"Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."
languages.original_text: "Справедливого расследования и суда Теодора фон Валанциус уже в любом случае не получит. Вердикт может вынести только Вольный Торговец... и он{mf||а} это уже сделал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “无论如何，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯已经再也无法得到公正的调查和审判了。只有行商浪人有权做出裁决……而{mf|他|她}已经这么做了。”
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: “无论如何，西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯已经再也无法得到公正的调查和审判了。只有行商浪人有权做出裁决……而{mf|他|她}已经这么做了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « De toute manière, même si une enquête était menée dans les règles, et ce serait déjà un miracle, Théodora von Valancius n'aurait jamais droit à un procès équitable. {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande} peut rendre un verdict... et {mf|il|elle} l'a déjà fait. »
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: « De toute manière, même si une enquête était menée dans les règles, et ce serait déjà un miracle, Théodora von Valancius n'aurait jamais droit à un procès équitable. {mf|Seul le libre-marchand|Seule la libre-marchande} peut rendre un verdict... et {mf|il|elle} l'a déjà fait. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «De todos modos, ahora Theodora von Valancius no recibiría una investigación y un juicio justos. Solo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede emitir un veredicto... cosa que ya ha hecho».
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: «De todos modos, ahora Theodora von Valancius no recibiría una investigación y un juicio justos. Solo {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente puede emitir un veredicto... cosa que ya ha hecho».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、とにかく公正な調査も審理も、決して受け付けない方だった。自由開拓者だけが評決を下せるのだ…そしてもう済んだことだ」
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: 「シオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスは、とにかく公正な調査も審理も、決して受け付けない方だった。自由開拓者だけが評決を下せるのだ…そしてもう済んだことだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius würde nun ohnehin niemals eine faire Untersuchung und einen fairen Prozess bekommen. Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann ein Urteil sprechen ... und das hat {mf|er|sie} bereits getan."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius würde nun ohnehin niemals eine faire Untersuchung und einen fairen Prozess bekommen. Nur {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} kann ein Urteil sprechen ... und das hat {mf|er|sie} bereits getan."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

languages.text: "Theodora von Valancius, zaten adaletli bir araştırma ve davaya konu olmazdı. Sadece Hür Tacir karar verebilir ki... Verdi de."
languages.original_text: "Theodora von Valancius would never receive a fair investigation and trial now anyway. Only the Rogue Trader can hand down a verdict... and {mf|he|she} has already done so."

traits.locale_text: "Theodora von Valancius zaten adaletli bir araştırma ve davaya konu olmazdı. Sadece Hür Tacir karar verebilir ve hatta verdi bile."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
